channel.title: GUI JTextArea
channel.description:
how can I change the String inside the JTextArea ? so what would the line of code look like? heres my object creation
Identifier = new JTextArea ("MyString",5, 5);
And i want to put it into code that listens for event.. blah blah blah.. { if command is blah NEED THIS CODE TO SET THE STRING TO NEW STRING ... }

item.title: GUI JTextArea
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

x19:

Read the api about JtextArea appending.

You’re not help with that because unlike most community members here that is the first thing i checked and could not understand that is why i made this post.

For (;); I was talking about changing the string after the string was initialized and declared. So the user performs some action, which changes the string displayed.

And I figured out that I had to use the setText method (least i think its a method… part of jtxt), but it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: GUI JTextArea
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:
